text: Ivan Urvanțev(born 2 May 1997) is a Moldovan professional footballer, currently playing as a midfielder for Ripensia Timișoara in the Romanian Liga II. ==References== == External links == * * Profile on fc-sheriff.com Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan footballers Category:Moldovan National Division players Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Sheriff Tiraspol players Category:CS Petrocub Hîncești players Category:FC Zaria Bălți players Category:FC Sfântul Gheorghe Suruceni players Category:FC Dinamo-Auto Tiraspol players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Ripensia Timișoara players Category:Moldovan expatriate footballers Category:Moldovan expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania
title: Ivan Urvanțev
